entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
